messages.message: Hey Germany! How’s it going? Looking forward to a fun game!
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Hey Germany! How’s it going? Looking forward to a fun game!'.

messages.message: Hello! I'm looking forward to a fun game as well. I usually see good things happen when Russia and Germany work together, so I hope we can both help each other in our initial plans. I'm assuming you're gonna try and attack Scandinavia first? Let me know your thoughts, and I look forward to us working well together
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Hello! I'm looking forward to a fun game as well. I usually see good things happen when Russia and Germany work together, so I hope we can both help each other in our initial plans. I'm assuming you're gonna try and attack Scandinavia first? Let me know your thoughts, and I look forward to us working well together'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. The response shows a willingness to collaborate and highlights the history of positive interactions between Germany and Russia, suggesting a genuine interest in working together strategically in the game.

messages.message: Hi Germany - sorry I’m behind the eightball here - got swamped with work
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Hi Germany - sorry I’m behind the eightball here - got swamped with work'.

messages.message: But that seems to have worked out well for you so I’m sure you’re not too upset lol
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'But that seems to have worked out well for you so I’m sure you’re not too upset lol'.

messages.message: To be honest I was expecting to bounce in Sweden 😅 . From what I've heard England is gonna move Norway --> St. Petersburg this Spring, just thought I'd let you know.
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'To be honest I was expecting to bounce in Sweden 😅 . From what I've heard England is gonna move Norway --> St. Petersburg this Spring, just thought I'd let you know.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. The content of the message includes specific game-related information about England's planned move, indicating a level of strategic transparency and collaboration from Germany towards Russia.
